CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Yang and coworkers used selenophene to replace thiophene π-bridge in the indacenodithiophene (IDT)-benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD)-based copolymer ( PThBDDIDT ) to develop a donor-π-acceptor type copolymer , PSeBDDIDT.

Let's think step by step.

1. selenophene
2. thiophene
3. indacenodithiophene (IDT)
4. benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD)
5. copolymer (PThBDDIDT)
6. donor-π-acceptor type copolymer (PSeBDDIDT)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. selenophene
2. thiophene
3. indacenodithiophene (IDT)
4. benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD)
5. copolymer PSeBDDIDT

These are the material names explicitly mentioned in the paragraph. Other entities like "Yang and coworkers", "used", "to replace", "develop", and "type" are not material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| selenophene |
| thiophene |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| benzo[1,2-c:4,5-c′]dithiophene-4,8-dione (BDD) |
| copolymer PSeBDDIDT |
